title: Scientific Literacy Enhancement Program Through Virtual Laboratory-Based Experimental Critical Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of scientific experiment procedures and core concepts of the scientific inquiry process
context.additional_context: Students utilize mobile environments with digital devices and virtual laboratories, iteratively performing experimental critiques and inquiry activities. Teachers support learning by providing experimental cases and feedback

learning_goals: Students can identify over 80% of experimental errors while critically reviewing experimental designs in virtual laboratories
Students can explain three or more methodological flaws occurring in the scientific inquiry process
Students derive scientific conclusions by analyzing data collected through virtual experiments with 90% accuracy.
Students can transfer and apply knowledge acquired from experimental critiques to new inquiry contexts with over 70% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
